Credmark Halloween Design Competition

Momin Ahmad I 10.26.2021

Halloween is just around the corner and the team at Credmark, as advocates of of de-risking, thought it would be exciting to challenge our community members to showcase what they think is the scariest DeFi pools.

Design Prompt

Defi is a scary place. There are exploits, hacks and all kinds of risk.

  • Create an illustration of the scariest defi projects/products/protocols that you know.
  • DO NOT put a company or protocolâ€™s name on your submission, but youâ€™re welcome to find novel ways to imply it.
  • Please enter your submissions in the ðŸŽƒâ”‚halloween-comp channel in our Discord.
  • Notice â€” We will assume consent for use of all art pieces when submitted unless stated otherwise. We will also give credit to the users whenever we use said piece.

Reward

  • 1st place: Pre-packed crucible with 1,000 CMK
  • 2nd place: 1,000 CMK
  • 3rd place: 500 CMK
  • All members will receive a POAP!

Submission begin: October 27th @ 9AM CST / 14:00 UTC

Deadline: October 30, 2021 @12PM CST/ 17:00 UTC Hit the

Feel free to chat us up in our Discord if with any questions or concerns!
